name: Claude Opus 4.5
query: SELECT r.task_id AS "Task", r.category AS "Category", ROUND(r.scores.detection * 100, 1) AS "Detection %", ROUND(r.scores.diagnosis * 100, 1) AS "Diagnosis %", ROUND(r.scores.recovery * 100, 1) AS "Recovery %", ROUND(r.scores.total, 1) AS "Total" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(r) WHERE r.agent_id = 'claude_opus_4_5' ORDER BY r.scores.total DESC

name: Gemini 2.5 Pro
query: SELECT r.task_id AS "Task", r.category AS "Category", ROUND(r.scores.detection * 100, 1) AS "Detection %", ROUND(r.scores.diagnosis * 100, 1) AS "Diagnosis %", ROUND(r.scores.recovery * 100, 1) AS "Recovery %", ROUND(r.scores.total, 1) AS "Total" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(r) WHERE r.agent_id = 'gemini_2_5_pro' ORDER BY r.scores.total DESC

name: Gemini 3 Pro
query: SELECT r.task_id AS "Task", r.category AS "Category", ROUND(r.scores.detection * 100, 1) AS "Detection %", ROUND(r.scores.diagnosis * 100, 1) AS "Diagnosis %", ROUND(r.scores.recovery * 100, 1) AS "Recovery %", ROUND(r.scores.total, 1) AS "Total" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(r) WHERE r.agent_id = 'gemini_3_pro' ORDER BY r.scores.total DESC

name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
query: SELECT r.task_id AS "Task", r.category AS "Category", ROUND(r.scores.detection * 100, 1) AS "Detection %", ROUND(r.scores.diagnosis * 100, 1) AS "Diagnosis %", ROUND(r.scores.recovery * 100, 1) AS "Recovery %", ROUND(r.scores.total, 1) AS "Total" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(r) WHERE r.agent_id = 'gemini_2_5_flash' ORDER BY r.scores.total DESC

name: GPT 5.2
query: SELECT r.task_id AS "Task", r.category AS "Category", ROUND(r.scores.detection * 100, 1) AS "Detection %", ROUND(r.scores.diagnosis * 100, 1) AS "Diagnosis %", ROUND(r.scores.recovery * 100, 1) AS "Recovery %", ROUND(r.scores.total, 1) AS "Total" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(r) WHERE r.agent_id = 'gpt_5_2' ORDER BY r.scores.total DESC

name: Overall Comparison
query: SELECT r.agent_id AS "Model", COUNT(*) AS "Tasks", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.detection) * 100, 1) AS "Avg Detection %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.diagnosis) * 100, 1) AS "Avg Diagnosis %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.recovery) * 100, 1) AS "Avg Recovery %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.total), 1) AS "Avg Total" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(r) WHERE r.scores.total IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.agent_id ORDER BY "Avg Total" DESC
